turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I ordered a new coffee maker last week, order number is 12345, and the tracking still says 'label created'. It's been 5 days! What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing delays with your order. Let me look into that for you. Just one moment...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I really need that coffee maker, I'm running on fumes over here!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I've checked order 12345. It appears there was a slight backlog at the warehouse due to unforeseen circumstances. It has now shipped and the tracking information should update within 24 hours. You can expect to receive it within 2 business days after that. I have added a 10% discount code COFFEE10 to your account for the inconvenience. Does that help?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's good to hear it's finally shipped. But how come your website said 'in stock' when I ordered it if there was a warehouse backlog? Shouldn't your site reflect actual inventory? And will I actually get it in 2 days this time or are you just saying that? I'm getting mixed signals here.
